description: This file defines a shopping list management system using classes and functions, including agents and teams, with methods to add, remove, and list items in a shared shopping list, demonstrating shared state management in a team context.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a role, model, tools, and instructions for managing tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by agents and teams.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team with shared state, tools, members, and instructions for collaborative tasks.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: Adds an item to the shared shopping list if it is not already present.

methods.name: remove_item
methods.description: Removes an item from the shared shopping list if it exists.

methods.name: remove_all_items
methods.description: Clears all items from the shared shopping list.

methods.name: list_items
methods.description: Lists all items currently in the shared shopping list.
